shortdesc.ph: Set the blocklist of subscriptions for video streams.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeVideoBlocklist(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber) = 0;
public abstract int SetSubscribeVideoBlocklist(uint[] uidList, int uidNumber);
Future<void> setSubscribeVideoBlocklist( {required List<int> uidList, required int uidNumber});

section.p: You can call this method to specify the video streams of a user that you do not want to subscribe to.

ul.li: The blocklist is not affected by the setting in , and autoSubscribeAudio in .

pt.props: cpp android electron unity rn flutter

pd.p: The user ID list of users that you do not want to subscribe to.

If you want to specify the video streams of a user that you do not want to subscribe to, add the user ID of that user in this list. If you want to remove a user from the blocklist, you need to call the method to update the user ID list; this means you only add the uid of users that you do not want to subscribe to in the new user ID list.
